content: Hello, I'm camelid. I've been programming in Rust for a few months and am currently writing a compiler using Rust and LLVM. I've been getting involved with the Servo project, and I would like to get involved with rustc as well!
Hi @Camelid! You may want to read the rustc dev guide. After that you could for example look for E-easy issues. If you have any questions feel free to ask at #t-compiler/help. Good luck!
Thanks! I've already read part of the dev guide, but there's more to read!
If you want an issue, feel free to send me a message i can assign an issue for you to work on :slight_smile:
